Reviews.Title: Great Camera for Active People
Reviews.Author: A Phile "Audiophile"
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for three months and it has been an excellent camera as far as being lightweight, easy to use, excellent image quality, good battery life except out in the cold.  Keep it warm if you are going to be ourside on freezing days.I am active and I wear this on my belt every day, it doesn't seem any heavier than my cellphone, and it is easy to start up to capture shots that come my way without forewarning.  You could use this camera for bycycling, running, walking, hiking, snowsports, travel and just about anything except swimming, but if you are going to do portraits you will probably want a camera with more manual adjustments.  I wouldn't use it to shoot a wedding, although it would be great as a backup.  The ISO range from 100 to 3200 is really an asset.The video on it is easy to use and is of good quality but not HD.I have big hands, and some arthritis, so I use a very small lightweight tripod for a handle to keep the camera from shaking when shooting video or shots where I cannot brace my arms. The tripod is about six inches long and I screw it into the camera and it give me the extra control, plus if I want to set it up on a tripod I can. This is in addition to the vibration reduction that is on the camera.  The 2.7 inch screen works for me because I want the camera to be light.  I have a digital SLR for more demanding photography, and a HD Camcorder, so this camera fits a slot.

Reviews.Title: Get it!
Reviews.Author: Leonard R. Debickero
Reviews.Content: Recommend this camera.  Not a photo expert and it is easy to use. A good deal of features I have not yet used or figured out but for ease of use our 9 year old is a master.  Zoom is very good. Right size too. Button feel good to use not cheap. Easy to remove battery pack and photo card slot,(after I read the instructions).  The only fault for this and current cameras the 10MP is not needed for everyday standard photos.  The file size is too large.  Now need software to reduce my photo file sizes for storage.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Shelley Arthur
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera on a Sunday and I had it by Wednesday. Fast shipping!! I have only ever owned a Kodak camera and was a little unsure to order my Nikon, but no worries. This camera is excellent. It has a lot of features and different scene modes. Excellent quality of pictures. Very clear and sharp. Very convienent size. Small enough to fit in a small purse but still easy to operate. Very cute and stylish too.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera so much, bought it twice
Reviews.Author: Eileen T. Vester "eileen"
Reviews.Content: I originally purchased this camera when it was first released, almost two years ago.  It has been the perfect little camera.  We went to the beach this year and unfortunately, as I was walking next to the ocean, a huge wave got me - and my little camera.  It was completely drowned in a second.  When we returned home from the trip, I began searching for this model again.  I found it on Amazon of course!  I didn't even bother looking at other cameras because I love this one.  I ordered it (terrific price), and it was here within a couple of days.  Awesome!I adore the color of this camera's case; it's so beautiful to look at.  It's easy to hold and shoot, and the large display is fantastic.  It shoots gorgeous photos and videos.  There are many, many features which I haven't even used yet because you really have to study the manual to know all of them.  But even with basic use, this camera does all the work for you.  AND it's cute!  Since it comes with a battery charger, it's easy to keep it charged, which is nice.I highly recommend this camera - it's a winner!

Reviews.Title: Coolpix 560
Reviews.Author: James Hood
Reviews.Content: The S560 is a full featured, easy to use small camera.  The only significant problem I have found with it is that the battery will not hold a charge for very long.

Reviews.Title: No more red eye and fuzzy pictures!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Bryant "follower"
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my Coolpix S560, as I am an artist and need to take clear photos.  Also, it is so small that I can carry it in my purse and have it handy for just the right moment.

Reviews.Title: Good choice for portability
Reviews.Author: millertime
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my wife. She wanted something compact loaded with features. WellNikon delivered all of that and more. I have been amazed at some of the pictures she hascaptured.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Good features and great picture for this price point.  The charger that has a pivoting plug would be better and more compact than this one with a cord.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: J. Hooper "J. Hooper"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this camera, it is a great value for the price. I bought it for my wife and she really likes it. It is easy to use and has excellent picturequality. I would recommend it for anyone looking for a good quality, inexpensivedigital camera.

Reviews.Title: Flash a Little Bright Love It
Reviews.Author: Sunny Cloudy Raining All At One Time "Guess w...
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for myself. I have something to say about these mandatory certain word length reviews. They are a pain. A purchaser should be able to say whatever or as little as they want as long as it's not vulgar or obscene.

Reviews.Title: Best
Reviews.Author: vader
Reviews.Content: This is the best little camra ever. I love the nikon camera and always will. Don't have a bad thing to say about it.

Reviews.Title: Not a typical Nikon camera
Reviews.Author: Amjad SIKILIGIRI
Reviews.Content: Wow, what an embarrassment. I got tricked with overall rating of the product, but after using it I can confidently  say that this is not a typical Nikon camera. Pic quality is awful especially in low light/nights. Took this camera as a gift and the person never used it!

Reviews.Title: great point and shoot.
Reviews.Author: Steven Shaw
Reviews.Content: I bought this one for my teenage daughter, and she absolutely loves it.  Compact to shove in your pocket, video and sound are good.  The only thing she wishes is that it had more zoom.  I'm sure by now there are bigger zooms out there, but I think we got a great camera for the price without going overboard.

Reviews.Title: great camera.... great vendor!!!
Reviews.Author: C. Grassel "Grassy one"
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfecct to replace the exact one that our daughter had stolen from her!! It's not a touch screen which is exactly what she wanted and this little camera takes GREAT pictures...Our daughter was and IS so happy with her new camera. Don't hesitate to buy from this SELLER!!! They are FANTASTIC!!! They kept me informed of every step of the way with the camera... when it was sent and how etc. Very Very Great SELLER!!! I would not want to buy a camera from anybody else!!! Honest, very fast shipping, takes obvious pride in their business... Thanks so much again for making our daughter so HAPPY!!!

Reviews.Title: Camera is junk
Reviews.Author: Meg
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera and it was broken after less than a year.  It just stopped working.  Nikon wanted to fix it for me for 99 dollars.... Total rip off...

Reviews.Title: Poor picture quality
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for a year now and I've just been disapointed in it.  I kept waiting for it to improve.  The ease of buttons and everything is great, nice and compact, has pretty decent features, but the picture quality is very poor, and really - what good are decent features if the end result is poor?  More often than not the pics are fuzzy, poor image stabilization, and poorly lit.  Also the picture turn around time is so slow.  It takes a really long time and I end up missing a lot of shots.  This was purchased after my Olympus had been dropped one too many times by my kids and I've been disapointed in it from the beginning.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera for Normal use
Reviews.Author: Sriram Krishnamurthy "Sriram"
Reviews.Content: Very good camera for normal use. Very good zoom, when compared to its similar cameras. Quality of the pictures are good.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: AK
Reviews.Content: I liked this and the price was unbeatable I checked in all big/small stores. So good value for the price

Reviews.Title: Exactly what she wanted.
Reviews.Author: H. Rainey
Reviews.Content: Gift for my 24 year old daughter. Just what she wanted; great product for the price.

ProductInfo.Features:
10.0-megapixel resolution for stunning prints as large as 16 x 20 inches
5x optical Zoom-Nikkor glass lens; Optical VR Image Stabilization
Bright 2.7-inch high-resolution LCD
Auto adjusts up to ISO 3200; Shutter and Blink Warning
Captures images to SD/SDHC cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon Coolpix S560 10MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom with 2.7 inch LCD (Cherry Blossom)
